message: Google Python Script to convert css from LTR to RTL
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: cssjanus -      Flips Cascading Style Sheets from a LTR orientation to a RTL orienation and vice-ver
caption: code.google.com
description: CSSJanus is CSS parser utility designed to aid the conversion of a website's layout from left-to-right(LTR) to right-to-left(RTL). The script was born out of a need to convert CSS for RTL languages when tables are not being used for layout (since tables will automatically reorder TD's in RTL).  CSSJ...
